issue.title: Python: Align scalar/pylist string encoding with pandas' one.
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-447](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-447). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
With Python 2, currently we generate `unicode` strings for a column with `to_pandas` but generate `str` strings for `to_pylist`. This should be aligned as well as some tests with non-ASCII characters added that verify the UTF-8 roundtrip.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-447?focusedCommentId=15785201) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 260
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/260>
